short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used for make the quote on from-us.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
From-Us.com  does its very best to offer the best in buying in USA, by developing more and more elaborated services. 
The team made a brainstorming to put in place a simplified purchase system, totally meeting your needs. Today, we are proud to present you MyBuddy, the brand new assistant which will make your purchases easy : buying in USA has never been so easy, for sure ! And you will find it only and exclusively at From-Us.com : it would be a shame not to use itâ€¦

What is MyBuddy ? 
An innovative tool hides behind this attractive name, created for you and only for you. This extension is settled in few seconds and allows you to purchase on the US website of your choice, just like that. Extremely simple,  you do not need to use From-US.com anymore or to place the order on the US website, our Conciergerie service will take it in charge for you. Smart and practical, our plug-in MyBuddy is there to meet all your needs.
